Visit historical events to witness important moments in history, such as the signing of the Declaration of Independence or the fall of the Berlin Wall.
Explore different cultures and civilizations by traveling to ancient cities like Rome, Egypt, or China.
Go back in time to meet famous historical figures, such as Leonardo da Vinci, Marie Curie, or Mahatma Gandhi.
Visit different eras to experience the way of life, such as living in a medieval castle or a Victorian mansion.
Go back in time to prevent a tragedy or disaster from happening, such as stopping the assassination of-saint Archduke Franz Ferdinand or preventing the nuclear bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki.
